title: Activated Shard on Loot By Accident
body: Hello Guys its my first time posting on board i am freaking out right now i just wasted all of my money becuase i accidently activated zoe instead of selling her to get 5000 be i didn't play 1 game on zoe so u guys dont think i change my mind or something please refund me my money thanks <3

replies.body:
Hey, just saw this. You should get a faster response by an actual Player Support Rioter (not this guy), if you open a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Hope this helped in time.
Are there players who actually use the rent feature intentionally and are satisfied with what they get? It feels like I only hear about it when people click the wrong button and freak out.
